Line1.10E35E: No! Akarat... I had some hope...
Line11.10E35E: A poor comfort to me, but it would comfort Symon. Thank you for bringing me back what was left of him.
Line3.BAE4: I'm so sorry. I managed to collect some of his writings. I thought you might like this - a thing to remember him by.
Line5.10E35E: Thank you... Curse my foolishness. I shouldn't have let him go.
Line9.BAE4: This wasn't your fault. But the man responsible - Elias - is gone.
